page.title: 05VILLAGE SCHOOLS
page.content: The children who go to the 26 year old Moulton School come from Moulton, Dalham and Kentford. There are 49 pupils, 3 teachers, 1 cook and her assistant. The school uniform is a maroon top and grey bottoms. The school hours are 9.00am to 12.00pm and 1.00pm to 3.15pm. There is an outdoor swimming pool, climbing frame and tennis court. The building contains 3 classrooms and is one storey high. There are 36 children in Gazeley School, which is similar to Moulton School. There are 3 teachers but only 2 classes. The school has been running since 1959, but there was an older school before this. The numbers of children are not now changing, but the headmaster, Mr. Baldry can't be sure if the school will close down. All the children come from Gazeley and Higham.
